# Typedown for VS Code

[Typedown](https://typedown.org) is a tool for **Progressive Formalization** of Markdown.

It bridges the gap between unstructured text and structured data, allowing you to gradually add types, schemas, and logic to your documentation.

## Features

- **Syntax Highlighting**: Proper highlighting for `.td` and Typedown extended markdown.
- **Language Server**: Real-time validation, diagnostics, and autocompletion.
- **Code Execution**: Execute Python code blocks directly within your markdown files.

## Usage

1. Open any `.td` or `.md` file.
2. Use the command palette (`Ctrl+Shift+P` or `Cmd+Shift+P`) to access Typedown commands.

## Installation

This extension is available on the [VS Code Marketplace](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Typedown.typedown-vscode).

## Issues

Please report issues on our [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/indenscale/typedown).
